name: Bedsure Comforters Queen Size - Down Alternative Comforter for All Season, Ultra-Soft Prewashed Duvet with 4 Tabs, Lightweight & Warm Bedding - Machine Washable, Linen, Queen, 88x88 Inches
short_description: 100% Polyester EXTRA SOFT: The prewashed microfiber cover of this comforter queen size offers an exceptionally soft and smooth touch, helping to alleviate the day's stress for a restful sleep without crinkly sounds. Approved Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX, it meets the highest standards for harmful chemicals, ensuring safety for humans and pets ENHANCED DURABILITY: Featuring enhanced thickness and density, this down alternative comforter offers neat stitching for stronger seams, ensuring improved durability for year-round use. For easy care, simply machine wash it in cold water on a gentle cycle and tumble dry low BALANCED WARMTH & BREATHABILITY: This lightweight comforter strikes the perfect balance between warmth and breathability with its fluffy fill and insulating layer, ensuring optimal heat retention and air circulation. It keeps you dry and comfortable throughout the night CASUAL STYLE: Crafted from prewashed microfiber, this all season comforter features a natural texture that adds a relaxed vibe and effortlessly complements any space, making it a great gift for Christmas and other holidays THOUGHTFUL DETAILS: The four corner tabs securely fasten your comforter into a duvet cover, providing versatile use as a standalone comforter. The quilted design keeps the fill in place for even warmth, while adding elegance to your room. Plus, it arrives in a vacuum-sealed package to minimize material usage and promote sustainability

name: Serta Goose Feather Down Fiber Cotton Comforter Queen Size - 100% Cotton Duvet Insert - Hotel Luxury Hypoallergenic Bedding Comforter All Season Medium Warmth 90 x 90 Inch White
short_description: 100% Cotton 【Luxury Feather Fiber ＆ Down Fiber Comforter】This duvet features a filling composed of 90% white goose feather fiber and 10% white goose down fiber. special FreshLoft technical processing, the down and feathers are made hypoallergenic. The premium filling has passed OEKO-TEX Certification, ensuring it is fluffy and odorless. Additionally, the duvet comforter is crafted from 100% cotton fabric, which is soft, natural, plush, and breathable, providing a noiseless and super cozy night's sleep. 【Elegant Craftsmanship】With End-To-End sewn-through box construction, the down could be evenly distributed in its proper place and keeps the down from shifting. So you always have a plush, fluffy comforter that retains its shape. The comforter has 4 Corner Loops, which is very convenient for attaching a duvet cover and anchor the down comforter from shifting. All our comforters feature self-piping stitching to enhance their durability and prevent the down from sneaking. 【Find Your Perfect One】We offer three sizes and three thicknesses( Light Warmth & All Seasons Medium Warmth & Extra Warmth). Twin (68"x 90"), Queen (90"x 90"), King (106"x 90"), If you're a hot sleeper or transitioning into the warmer months, we recommend trying the All Season Medium Warmth version. 【Care Instruction】Serta goose feather fiber down fiber comforter comes with a vacuum pack, please pat it up gently and wait a few moments for it back to original lofty. （Dry Clean only） 【Quality Assurance】Products from bedding American manufacturer with over 36 years of experience, committed to developing high-quality products and providing excellent customer service. if you have any concerns or are unsatisfied with our product, please feel free to contact us anytime, and we will ensure your complete satisfaction.
product_description: This Serta white goose feather and down fiber comforter is the perfect solution for warmth and comfort. The unique fill gives you the look and feel of an all down filled comforter for a fraction of the cost. The all-season warmth fill weight is perfect for almost climate. You’ll love the look and feel of the 233-thread count, breathable 100% cotton cover. The end to end sewn through box quilting ensures that the white goose fiber doesn’t shift, so you’ll never have any cold spots on the bed.

name: DOWNCOOL Comforters Queen Size, Duvet Insert, White All Season Duvet, Lightweight Quilt, Down Alternative Hotel Comforter with Corner Tabs (White, Queen 88x92 Inches)
short_description: *All-season comforter duvet insert* Ultra-soft microfiber polyester fabric covering for more fluffiness. No Noise, More Breathable, and less likely to Tear or have Horrible Odors. *88x92 Inches queen skin friendly comforter* 3D&7D goose down alternative filling, weighted not too heavy to pressure, feel comfortable in all seasons. *Box-stitch construction* Keep the fill from shifting or clumping, ensuring a smooth look and soft feeling for long time. Four duvet loops-sewn corner, help the comforter to grab a duvet cover. *Machine washable &easy to care* Recommended that machine wash in cold water, and do not wash with other clothes that have zippers or sharp objects. Dry at low temperature. It won't shrink and fade easily, which saves you a lot of time and energy. *Vacuum Packaging* The vacuum-sealed packaging ensures the cleanliness and convenient transportation of the duvet insert. To restore its fluffiness, simply remove it from the packaging bag upon arrival, gently fluff and shake it for a while, then allow it to rest separately for a few hours, and it will regain its original shape.

name: LINENSPA White Down Alternative Comforter and Duvet Insert - All-Season Comforter with Box Stitch and 8 Duvet Loops - Bedding for Kids, Teens, and Adults - Queen
short_description: ALL SEASON COMFORT: With 300 gsm of plush down alternative fill, this is the best all season comforter. It’s lightweight for summer but ultra-soft and cozy for winter, making it the perfect option for any time of the year DOWN ALTERNATIVE FILL: For those who love the fluffy comfort of down, but hate the allergens and sharp quills, we present this all-season, hypoallergenic microfiber comforter and duvet insert QUILTED DESIGN: Style that’s functional? Yes, please. The box-stitched construction keeps all that fluffy fill in place, so your comforter retains its shape and stays pretty with its classic quilted look COMFORTER AND DUVET INSERT: Whether you’re looking for a microfiber comforter or a duvet cover insert, we’ve got you covered. Eight built-in corner and side loops keep this comforter securely in place all night long MACHINE WASHABLE: Simply wash on gentle cycle and air dry, or if you’re short on time, toss in your dryer on a low heat setting; comforter has a 3-year warranty and is available in multiple standard and oversized dimensions
product_description: This fluffy comforter offers cozy all-season comfort and versatile style for any bedroom in your home. The crisp and clean all white look can stand on its own for a modern feel or be used as a fluffy duvet insert to fit your specific vibe. Complete with our patented 8 loops on the corners and sides, this comforter securely attaches to any duvet cover and won’t get twisted up in the night. But, if you want to use it as a blanket, they won’t get in your way. And the convenient box stitching keeps the fill evenly distributed no matter what. Comfortable down alternative fill provides all the softness of down without the odor and sharp quills, making this comforter great for those with allergies. Perfect for all-season use, this comforter creates a stylish, comfortable, and cozy look everyone in the family will love.

name: Blue Ridge Home Fashions Luxury 1000 Thread Count Pima Cotton Down Alternative Comforter-Year Round, All Season Cover, King, White
short_description: 100% Cotton 【Product Demension】Sizes are availabe in Twin:68x90in /Full-Queen:90x98in /King:108x98in. Incomparable softness and bulkiness create the ultimate comfort, provide you a cozy and silent sleep. 【Distinctive Elaborate Design】14-inch baffled box construction, self piping ensures filling evenly in each individual compartments to prevent clumping and shifting.Baffle Box Construction is designed for maximum loft, warmth and durability.
